name: Puzzle Spy: Pull the Pin
description:
Pull the pin in right order to save the girl!
Unique levels, enemy spies, zombies, mummies, killer robots, cyborgs, and much more. A variety of obstacles you have never experienced before awaits
Feel the joy of solving interesting obstacles along the way and saving the hero from crisis
Use your excellent intelligence to you fullest to save her!


Game features
- Play it anywhere anytime!
- Unique escape puzzle game
- Find solutions of the riddles
- Collect golds and gather various character skins
- Simple but addictive gameplay
- Offline
- singleplayer
